supplyDemandQuery.title: Final energy by aggregate end-use sector and fuel
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and ((@name='building' or @name='industry' or @name='transportation') or (exists(child::keyword/@final-energy)))]//*[@type='input' and not (@name='renewable')]/demand-physical[@unit='EJ']/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Primary energy with CCS (Direct Equivalent)
supplyDemandQuery.comments: WARNING: Results are slightly inflated due to improper secondary-output accounting

supplyDemandQuery.title: Electricity generation by aggregate technology
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type = 'sector' (: collapse :) and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld' or @name='industrial energy use' )]//*[@type = 'technology' and not (@name='elect_td_bld' or @name='electricity')]/*[@type='output' (:collapse:) and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld')]/physical-output/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Electricity generation by technology (inc solar roofs)
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type = 'sector' (: collapse :) and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld' or @name='industrial energy use')]//*[@type = 'technology' and not (@name='elect_td_bld' or @name='electricity')]/*[@type='output' (:collapse:) and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld')]/physical-output/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: CO2 Emissions by enduse
Regional energy costs
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type = 'sector' and ((@name='regional oil' or @name='regional natural gas' or @name='regional coal' or @name='regional biomass' or @name='nuclearFuelGenIII' or @name='electricity'))]/cost/text()
